# <EXECTUSCRIPT>
def execute(conn, inputs, params, outputs, reportFileName):

    '''
    载入模块
    '''
    from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
    import os
    import pickle
    import db_utils
    import joblib
    import sys
    import json
    import warnings
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    from SourceCodeImporter import SourceCodeImporter
    from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
    from sklearn2pmml import PMMLPipeline, sklearn2pmml
    from report_utils import ALogReport
    from common import get_db_column
    from common import get_feature
    from common import get_label
    from common import str_to_dict
    from common import get_alog_info
    from common import get_db_column_with_type
    from common import keep_dot_after

    warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
    '''
    载入redis连接信息
    '''
    redisParam = json.loads(params['redis'])
    redisConn = db_utils.getRedisMasterConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                  redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    '''
    远程模块载入
    '''
    alog_names = get_alog_info(redisConn)
    s = SourceCodeImporter()
    for name in alog_names:
        code = db_utils.redisReadHsetFile(redisConn, "alogclass", name)
        s.add(name, code.decode())
    sys.meta_path.append(s)
    from LIGHTGBM import LIGHTGBM
    '''
    获取输入数据
    '''
    keep_dot_after(db_type, inputs)
    data_in = db_utils.query(conn, 'select * from ' + inputs['data_in'], db_type)

    data_in_shape = data_in.shape
    '''
    转换后的参数
    '''
    db_columns = get_db_column_with_type(db_type, inputs, conn)
    columns_values = get_feature(db_columns, params['gbm_inputfeaturecolumn'])
    label_column = get_label(db_columns, params['gbm_labelcolumn'])
    '''
       存放临时超时参数
       '''
    params['other_params_dict'] = str_to_dict(params['other_params'])
    '''
    管道处理XGBOOST
    '''
    gbm = LIGHTGBM(params, columns_values, label_column)
    # x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(data_in[columns_values], data_in[label_column],
    #                                                     train_size=float(params['gbm_trainingset']),
    #                                                     test_size=float(params['gbm_testset']))
    gbm.fit(data_in[columns_values], data_in[label_column])
    # y_predict = pd.DataFrame(gbm.clf.predict(x_test), columns=['y_predict'])

    '''
    保存文件到redis
    '''
    pipeline_pkl_name = outputs['model'].split('_', 1)[0]
    joblib.dump(gbm, params['pipeline_file'] + "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name, compress=3)
    fileObject = pickle.dumps(joblib.load(params['pipeline_file'] + "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name))
    os.remove(params['pipeline_file'] + "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name)
    '''
    保存pkl的二进制文件到redis中
    '''
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name, fileObject)
    '''
    模型输出
    '''
    joblib.dump(gbm, params['pipeline_file'] + "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name, compress=3)
    fileObject = pickle.dumps(joblib.load(params['pipeline_file'] + "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name))
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name, fileObject)
    os.remove(params['pipeline_file'] + "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name)
    '''
    获取当前节点的前置节点
    '''
    pipeline_list = []
    redisConn_slave = db_utils.getRedisSlaveConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                       redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    for pkl_file in json.loads(params['pipelines']):
        pkl_obj = db_utils.redisReadHsetFile(redisConn_slave, params['project_id'], "pkl_" + str(pkl_file))
        if pkl_obj == None:
            continue
        pipeline_list.append((str(pkl_file), pickle.loads(pkl_obj)))
    pipeline_list.append(('classifier', gbm))
    '''
    pipeline模型输出
    '''
    pipeline = Pipeline(pipeline_list)
    joblib.dump(pipeline, params['pipeline_file'] + "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name, compress=3)
    fileObject = pickle.dumps(joblib.load(params['pipeline_file'] + "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name))
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name, fileObject)
    os.remove(params['pipeline_file'] + "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name)

    '''
    模型文件导出
    '''
    try:
        pipeline = PMMLPipeline([("classifier", gbm.clf)])
        pipeline.fit(data_in[columns_values], data_in[label_column])
        sklearn2pmml(pipeline, "test_lightgbm.pmml", debug=False)
        with open("test_lightgbm.pmml", "r") as f:
            pmml_str = f.read()
            db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "sp_model_pmml_" + pipeline_pkl_name, pmml_str)
        os.remove("test_lightgbm.pmml")
    except Exception as e:
        print("pmml模型导出失败:{}\n".format(e))

    '''
    保存模型pkl的参数到redis
    '''
    pkl_params = {}
    for i, v in data_in.dtypes.items():
        pkl_params[str(i)]=str(v)
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "params_" + pipeline_pkl_name, str(pkl_params))
    '''
    报表输出
    '''
    model_params = {}
    model_params['训练标签'] = ','.join(columns_values)
    model_params['标记标签'] = label_column
    model_params['树的数目'] = params['gbm_n_estimators']
    model_params['树的最大深度'] = params['gbm_max_depth']
    model_params['学习速率'] = params['gbm_learning_rate']
    model_params['每棵树的最多叶子数'] = params['gbm_num_leaves']
    model_params['建立一个叶子所需要的的最少样本数'] = params['gbm_min_child_samples']
    model_params['建立一个叶子的最小hessian值'] = params['gbm_min_child_weight']
    model_params['每次新建一棵树时，随机使用多少的特征'] = params['gbm_feature_fraction']
    model_params['每次进行bagging时，随机使用多少的样本'] = params['gbm_min_child_weight']
    model_params['每建立多少棵树，就进行一次bagging'] = params['gbm_bagging_freq']


    # report = ALogReport().report_train(y_test.astype(str), pd.DataFrame(np.where(y_predict<0.5, 0, 1)).astype(str(y_test.dtype)), 'LIGHTGBM 评估报告', model_params, gbm.df_importances, gbm.importances_columns)
    report = ALogReport().report_train('LIGHTGBM 评估报告', model_params, gbm.df_importances, gbm.importances_columns)

    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "report_json_" + reportFileName, json.dumps(report, ensure_ascii=False))

    # '''
    # 数据输出
    # '''
    # data_out = gbm.transform(data_in)
    # '''
    # 构建输出结果的shape
    # '''
    # db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "shape_" + outputs['data_out'], str(data_out.shape[0]) + "," + str(data_out.shape[1]))
    #
    # change_shape = {
    #     'data_in': {
    #         'startAt': 1,
    #         'endAt': data_in_shape[1]
    #     },
    #     'data_out': {
    #         'startAt': 1,
    #         'endAt': data_out.shape[1]
    #     },
    #     "change": {
    #         'startAt': data_in_shape[1] + 1,
    #         'endAt': data_out.shape[1]
    #     }
    # }
    # db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "change_shape_" + pipeline_pkl_name,json.dumps(change_shape))
    #
    # '''
    # 将结果写出
    # '''
    # db_utils.write_db_table(db_type=db_type, conn=conn, table_name=outputs['data_out'], data_frame=data_out,
    #                         client=client, schema=inputs['schema'], hdfs_path=hdfsTmpPath)

children.name: CATBOOST
children.description:
catboost (Gradient Boosting Categorical Features）也是一种boosting算法，和其他boosting算法不同的是该算法使用oblivious树作为基本预测器，这种树是平衡的，可以减少过拟合的发生，同时支持类别型变量的输入。在算法的性能和可扩展性方面也有较好的性能。

catboost-超参数说明


iterations：最大树数。默认1000。

learning_rate: 学习率，初始状态建议选择较大的学习率，设置为0.1.

depth: 决策树的深度

1）具体指决策树走到最终结果过程中的节点个数。
2）一般来说，数据少或者特征少的时候可以不管这个值。如果模型样本量多，特征也多的情况下，推荐限制这个最大深度。
3）默认值：空值
4）取值范围：正整数
常用：[3,8]

elements.name: catboost_input_feature_column
elements.label: 输入特征列
elements.placeholder: 请输入特征所在列序号或者列名称
elements.toolTip: 表示需处理的特征所在列序号或者列名称，如“1-3,10,column1”,表示取特征在表中的1到3列，10列 和字段名称为column1的列，列序号从1开始计数，不包含序号列。

elements.name: catboost_label_column
elements.label: 标签列
elements.placeholder: 请输入标签所在列序号或者列名称，如：1
elements.toolTip: 标签列所在列序号或者列名称，从1开始计数，不包含序号列。

elements.name: catboost_iterations
elements.label: iterations
elements.toolTip: 最大树数。默认1000

elements.name: catboost_learning_rate
elements.label: learning_rate
elements.toolTip: 学习率。默认0.03。

elements.name: catboost_max_depth
elements.label: depth
elements.toolTip: 树深，最大16，建议在1到10之间。默认6。

elements.name: other_params
elements.label: 其他超参数设置
elements.toolTip: 请输入配置的超参数。参数1=值1;参数2=值2

def execute(conn, inputs, params, outputs, reportFileName):

    '''
    载入模块
    '''
    from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
    import os
    import pickle
    import db_utils
    import joblib
    import sys
    import json
    import warnings
    import pandas as pd
    from SourceCodeImporter import SourceCodeImporter
    from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
    from report_utils import ALogReport
    from common import get_db_column
    from common import get_feature
    from common import get_label
    from common import str_to_dict
    from common import get_alog_info
    from common import get_db_column_with_type
    from common import keep_dot_after
    warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
    '''
    载入redis连接信息
    '''
    redisParam = json.loads(params['redis'])
    redisConn = db_utils.getRedisMasterConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                  redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    '''
    远程模块载入
    '''
    alog_names = get_alog_info(redisConn)
    s = SourceCodeImporter()
    for name in alog_names:
        code = db_utils.redisReadHsetFile(redisConn, "alogclass", name)
        s.add(name, code.decode())
    sys.meta_path.append(s)
    from CATBOOST import CATBOOST

    '''
    获取输入数据
    '''
    keep_dot_after(db_type, inputs)
    data_in = db_utils.query(conn, 'select * from ' + inputs['data_in'], db_type)

    data_in_shape = data_in.shape
    '''
    转换后的参数
    '''
    db_columns = get_db_column_with_type(db_type, inputs, conn)
    columns_values = get_feature(db_columns, params['catboost_input_feature_column'])
    label_column = get_label(db_columns, params['catboost_label_column'])

    '''
    存放临时超时参数
    '''
    params['other_params_dict'] = str_to_dict(params['other_params'], ";")

    '''
    管道处理CATBOOST
    '''
    catboost = CATBOOST(params, columns_values, label_column)
    # x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(data_in[columns_values], data_in[label_column],
    #                                                     train_size=float(params['catboost_training_set']),
    #                                                     test_size=float(params['catboost_test_set']))
    catboost.fit(data_in[columns_values], data_in[label_column])
    # y_predict = pd.DataFrame(catboost.clf.predict(x_test), columns=['y_predict'])

    '''
    保存文件到redis
    '''
    pipeline_pkl_name = outputs['model'].split('_', 1)[0]
    joblib.dump(catboost, params['pipeline_file'] + "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name, compress=3)
    fileObject = pickle.dumps(joblib.load(params['pipeline_file'] + "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name))
    os.remove(params['pipeline_file'] + "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name)
    '''
    保存pkl的二进制文件到redis中
    '''
    import json
    redisParam = json.loads(params['redis'])
    redisConn = db_utils.getRedisMasterConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                  redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name, fileObject)
    '''
    模型输出
    '''
    joblib.dump(catboost, params['pipeline_file'] + "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name, compress=3)
    fileObject = pickle.dumps(joblib.load(params['pipeline_file'] + "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name))
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name, fileObject)
    os.remove(params['pipeline_file'] + "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name)
    '''
    获取当前节点的前置节点
    '''
    pipeline_list = []
    redisConn_slave = db_utils.getRedisSlaveConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                       redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    for pkl_file in json.loads(params['pipelines']):
        pkl_obj = db_utils.redisReadHsetFile(redisConn_slave, params['project_id'], "pkl_" + str(pkl_file))
        if pkl_obj == None:
            continue
        pipeline_list.append((str(pkl_file), pickle.loads(pkl_obj)))
    pipeline_list.append(('classifier', catboost))
    '''
    pipeline模型输出
    '''
    pipeline = Pipeline(pipeline_list)
    joblib.dump(pipeline, params['pipeline_file'] + "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name, compress=3)
    fileObject = pickle.dumps(joblib.load(params['pipeline_file'] + "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name))
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name, fileObject)
    os.remove(params['pipeline_file'] + "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name)

    # pipeline = PMMLPipeline([("classifier", catboost.clf)])
    # pipeline.fit(x_train, y_train)
    # sklearn2pmml(pipeline, "test_catboost.pmml")

    '''
    模型文件导出
    '''
    try:
        catboost.clf.save_model("test_catboost.pmml", format="pmml")
        with open("test_catboost.pmml", "r") as f:
            pmml_str = f.read()
            db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "sp_model_pmml_" + pipeline_pkl_name, pmml_str)
        os.remove("test_catboost.pmml")
    except Exception as e:
        print("pmml模型导出失败:{}\n".format(e))

    '''
    保存模型pkl的参数到redis
    '''
    pkl_params = {}
    for i, v in data_in.dtypes.items():
        pkl_params[str(i)]=str(v)
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "params_" + pipeline_pkl_name, str(pkl_params))
    '''
    报表输出
    '''
    model_params = {}
    model_params['训练标签'] = ','.join(columns_values)
    model_params['标记标签'] = label_column
    model_params['最大树数'] = params['catboost_iterations']
    model_params['树的最大深度'] = params['catboost_max_depth']
    model_params['学习率'] = params['catboost_learning_rate']
    model_params['其他超参数'] = params['other_params']

    # y_test = y_test.astype(str)

    report = ALogReport().report_train('CatBoost 评估报告', model_params, catboost.df_importances, catboost.importances_columns)

    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "report_json_" + reportFileName, json.dumps(report, ensure_ascii=False))

    # '''
    # 数据输出
    # '''
    # data_out = catboost.transform(data_in)
    # '''
    # 构建输出结果的shape
    # '''
    # db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "shape_" + outputs['data_out'], str(data_out.shape[0]) + "," + str(data_out.shape[1]))
    #
    # change_shape = {
    #     'data_in': {
    #         'startAt': 1,
    #         'endAt': data_in_shape[1]
    #     },
    #     'data_out': {
    #         'startAt': 1,
    #         'endAt': data_out.shape[1]
    #     },
    #     "change": {
    #         'startAt': data_in_shape[1] + 1,
    #         'endAt': data_out.shape[1]
    #     }
    # }
    # db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "change_shape_" + pipeline_pkl_name,json.dumps(change_shape))
    # '''
    # 将结果写出
    # '''
    # db_utils.write_db_table(db_type=db_type, conn=conn, table_name=outputs['data_out'], data_frame=data_out,
    #                         client=client, schema=inputs['schema'], hdfs_path=hdfsTmpPath)

# <ALOGCLASSNAME>
# GRIDSEARCH
# </ALOGCLASSNAME>

# <EXECTUSCRIPT>
def execute(conn, inputs, params, outputs, reportFileName):

    '''
    载入模块
    '''
    from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
    import os
    import ast
    import pickle
    import db_utils
    import joblib
    import sys
    import json
    import warnings
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    from SourceCodeImporter import SourceCodeImporter
    from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
    from sklearn2pmml import PMMLPipeline, sklearn2pmml
    from report_utils import Report
    from common import get_db_column
    from common import get_feature
    from common import get_label
    from common import get_alog_info
    from common import dict_value_transform_list
    from common import get_db_column_with_type
    from common import keep_dot_after
    warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
    '''
        载入redis连接信息
        '''
    redisParam = json.loads(params['redis'])
    redisConn = db_utils.getRedisMasterConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                  redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    '''
    远程模块载入
    '''
    alog_names = get_alog_info(redisConn)
    s = SourceCodeImporter()
    for name in alog_names:
        code = db_utils.redisReadHsetFile(redisConn, "alogclass", name)
        s.add(name, code.decode())
    sys.meta_path.append(s)
    from GRIDSEARCH import GRIDSEARCH
    '''
    获取输入数据
    '''
    keep_dot_after(db_type, inputs)
    data_in = db_utils.query(conn, 'select * from ' + inputs['data_in'], db_type)

    data_in_shape = data_in.shape
    '''
    转换后的参数
    '''
    db_columns = get_db_column_with_type(db_type, inputs, conn)
    columns_values = get_feature(db_columns, params['input_feature_column'])
    label_column = get_label(db_columns, params['label_column'])

    '''
    处理参数
    '''
    tmp_params = {}
    if params['other_params'] != '':
        tmp_params = ast.literal_eval(params['other_params'])
    alog_params = {'["lr"]': ['penalty', 'C'],
                  '["rf"]': ['n_estimators', 'max_depth', 'min_samples_split'],
                  '["xgboost"]': ['learning_rate','max_depth', 'n_estimators'],
                  '["gbdt"]': ['learning_rate','max_depth', 'n_estimators', 'min_samples_split'],
                  '["lightgbm"]': ['learning_rate','max_depth', 'n_estimators'],
                  '["catboost"]': ['learning_rate','max_depth', 'n_estimators']}
    tmp_params.update({key: params[key] for key in alog_params[params['algorithm']]})
    params['other_params_dict'] = tmp_params
    dict_value_transform_list(params['other_params_dict'])

    '''
    管道处理GridSearch
    '''
    grid_search = GRIDSEARCH(params, columns_values, label_column)
    # x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(data_in[columns_values], data_in[label_column],
    #                                                     train_size=float(params['training_set']),
    #                                                     test_size=float(params['test_set']))
    grid_search.fit(data_in[columns_values], data_in[label_column])
    # y_predict = pd.DataFrame(grid_search.clf.predict(x_test), columns=['y_predict'])

    '''
    保存文件到redis
    '''
    pipeline_pkl_name = outputs['model'].split('_', 1)[0]
    joblib.dump(grid_search, params['pipeline_file'] + "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name, compress=3)
    fileObject = pickle.dumps(joblib.load(params['pipeline_file'] + "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name))
    os.remove(params['pipeline_file'] + "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name)
    '''
    保存pkl的二进制文件到redis中
    '''
    import json
    redisParam = json.loads(params['redis'])
    redisConn = db_utils.getRedisMasterConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                  redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name, fileObject)
    '''
    模型输出
    '''
    joblib.dump(grid_search, params['pipeline_file'] + "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name, compress=3)
    fileObject = pickle.dumps(joblib.load(params['pipeline_file'] + "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name))
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name, fileObject)
    os.remove(params['pipeline_file'] + "model_" + pipeline_pkl_name)
    '''
    获取当前节点的前置节点
    '''
    pipeline_list = []
    redisConn_slave = db_utils.getRedisSlaveConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                       redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    for pkl_file in json.loads(params['pipelines']):
        pkl_obj = db_utils.redisReadHsetFile(redisConn_slave, params['project_id'], "pkl_" + str(pkl_file))
        if pkl_obj == None:
            continue
        pipeline_list.append((str(pkl_file), pickle.loads(pkl_obj)))
    pipeline_list.append(('classifier', grid_search))
    '''
    pipeline模型输出
    '''
    pipeline = Pipeline(pipeline_list)
    joblib.dump(pipeline, params['pipeline_file'] + "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name, compress=3)
    fileObject = pickle.dumps(joblib.load(params['pipeline_file'] + "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name))
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name, fileObject)
    os.remove(params['pipeline_file'] + "pipeline_" + pipeline_pkl_name)

    '''
    模型文件导出
    '''
    try:
        pipeline = PMMLPipeline([("classifier", grid_search.clf)])
        pipeline.fit(data_in[columns_values], data_in[label_column])
        sklearn2pmml(pipeline, "test_grid.pmml", debug=False)
        with open("test_grid.pmml", "r") as f:
            pmml_str = f.read()
            db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "sp_model_pmml_" + pipeline_pkl_name, pmml_str)
        os.remove("test_grid.pmml")
    except Exception as e:
        print("pmml模型导出失败:{}\n".format(e))

    '''
    保存模型pkl的参数到redis
    '''
    pkl_params = {}
    for i, v in data_in.dtypes.items():
        pkl_params[str(i)]=str(v)
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "params_" + pipeline_pkl_name, str(pkl_params))
    '''
    报表输出
    '''
    report = {}
    param_result = grid_search.df_params_result
    param_result.columns = ['name', 'value']
    param_result = param_result.to_dict("reports")
    temp_result = {}
    for item in param_result:
        temp_result[item['name']] = item['value']
    report['model_params'] = temp_result
    report['evaluation'] = {
        'accuracy': '',
        'precision': "",
        'recall': "",
        'f1': '',
        'ks': '',
        'auc': '',
    }
    report['featureImportance'] = []
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "report_json_" + reportFileName, json.dumps(report, ensure_ascii=False))

    # '''
    # 数据输出
    # '''
    # data_out = grid_search.transform(data_in)
    # '''
    # 构建输出结果的shape
    # '''
    # db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "shape_" + outputs['data_out'], str(data_out.shape[0]) + "," + str(data_out.shape[1]))
    #
    # change_shape = {
    #     'data_in': {
    #         'startAt': 1,
    #         'endAt': data_in_shape[1]
    #     },
    #     'data_out': {
    #         'startAt': 1,
    #         'endAt': data_out.shape[1]
    #     },
    #     "change": {
    #         'startAt': data_in_shape[1] + 1,
    #         'endAt': data_out.shape[1]
    #     }
    # }
    # db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "change_shape_" + pipeline_pkl_name,json.dumps(change_shape))
    #

    # '''

    #                         client=client, schema=inputs['schema'], hdfs_path=hdfsTmpPath)

algorithm: 算法名(lr, rf, gbdt, xgboost, lightgbm, catboost)
other_params: 和算法关联的其他超参数，需要进行网格搜索。示例: 参数名1=(开始值,结束值, 步长),参数名2=[值1,值2,值3]

# <EXECTUSCRIPT>
def execute(conn, inputs, params, outputs, reportFileName):

    '''
    载入模块
    '''
    from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
    import os
    import pickle
    import db_utils
    import joblib
    import sys
    import json
    import warnings
    from report_utils import ALogReport
    from common import get_db_column
    from common import get_feature
    from common import get_alog_info
    from common import get_label
    from SourceCodeImporter import SourceCodeImporter
    from common import get_db_column_with_type
    from common import keep_dot_after

    warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
    '''
    载入redis连接信息
    '''
    redisParam = json.loads(params['redis'])
    redisConn = db_utils.getRedisMasterConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                  redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    '''
    远程模块载入
    '''
    '''
    远程模块载入
    '''
    alog_names = get_alog_info(redisConn)
    s = SourceCodeImporter()
    for name in alog_names:
        code = db_utils.redisReadHsetFile(redisConn, "alogclass", name)
        s.add(name, code.decode())
    sys.meta_path.append(s)
    from ModelPredict import ModelPredict
    # from pipeline.alogclass.ModelPredict import ModelPredict

    '''
    获取输入数据
    '''
    keep_dot_after(db_type, inputs)
    data_in = db_utils.query(conn, 'select * from ' + inputs['data_in'], db_type)
    data_in_shape = data_in.shape

    model = db_utils.redisReadHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "model_" + inputs['model'].split('_', 1)[0])
    service_model = pickle.loads(model)

    '''
    转换后的参数
    '''
    db_columns = get_db_column_with_type(db_type, inputs, conn)
    columns_values = get_feature(db_columns, params['predict_input_feature_column'])
    label_column = get_label(db_columns, params['predict_label_column'])

    '''
    管道处理
    '''
    model_predict = ModelPredict(params, columns_values,label_column, service_model)
    model_predict.fit()
    data_out = model_predict.transform(data_in)

    '''
    保存文件到redis
    '''
    pipeline_pkl_name = outputs['data_out'].split('_', 1)[0]
    joblib.dump(model_predict, params['pipeline_file']+"pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name, compress=3)
    fileObject = pickle.dumps(joblib.load(params['pipeline_file']+"pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name))
    os.remove(params['pipeline_file']+"pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name)
    '''
    保存pkl的二进制文件到redis中
    '''
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "pkl_" + pipeline_pkl_name, fileObject)
    '''
    保存模型pkl的参数到redis
    '''
    pkl_params = {}
    for i, v in data_in.dtypes.items():
        pkl_params[str(i)]=str(v)
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "params_" + pipeline_pkl_name, str(pkl_params))

    '''
    构建pipeline
    '''
    pipe = Pipeline([
        ('ModelPredict', model_predict)
    ])
    data_out = pipe.transform(data_in)


    '''
    构建输出结果的shape
    '''
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "shape_" + outputs['data_out'], str(data_out.shape[0]) + "," + str(data_out.shape[1]))

    change_shape = {
        'data_in': {
            'startAt': 1,
            'endAt': data_in_shape[1]
        },
        'data_out': {
            'startAt': 1,
            'endAt': data_out.shape[1]
        },
        "change": {
            'startAt': data_in_shape[1] + 1,
            'endAt': data_out.shape[1]
        }
    }
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "change_shape_" + pipeline_pkl_name,json.dumps(change_shape))

    '''
    将结果写出
    '''
    db_utils.write_db_table(db_type=db_type, conn=conn, table_name=outputs['data_out'], data_frame=data_out,
                            client=client, schema=inputs['schema'], hdfs_path=hdfsTmpPath, delimiter=";")

# <EXECTUSCRIPT>
def execute(conn, inputs, params, outputs, reportFileName):

    '''
    载入模块
    '''
    import report_utils
    import db_utils
    import scikitplot as skplt
    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    from common import get_db_column, get_feature, get_label
    import warnings
    import json
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    import sklearn.metrics as mt
    from common import get_db_column_with_type
    from common import keep_dot_after
    import ast
    warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

    redisParam = json.loads(params['redis'])
    redisConn = db_utils.getRedisMasterConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                  redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    '''
       转换后的参数
       '''
    keep_dot_after(db_type, inputs)
    db_columns = get_db_column_with_type(db_type, inputs, conn)
    label_column = get_label(db_columns, params['label_column'])
    predict_score_column = get_label(db_columns, params['predict_score_column'])
    postive_sample_value = int(params['postive_sample_value'])

    '''
    选择目标数据
    '''
    data_in = db_utils.query(conn,'select * from ' + inputs['data_in'], db_type)

    y_test = data_in[label_column]

    '''
    读取数据
    '''
    y_test = y_test.astype(float)
    y_probas = pd.DataFrame({'0': [], '1': []})
    if postive_sample_value == 0:
        y_probas['0'] = data_in[predict_score_column]
        y_probas['1'] = 1 - data_in[predict_score_column]
    elif postive_sample_value == 1:
        y_probas['1'] = data_in[predict_score_column]
        y_probas['0'] = 1 - data_in[predict_score_column]
    y_probas = y_probas.loc[:, ['1']]

    y_predict = (y_probas > float(params['twoclassthreshold'])).astype(float)

    '''
          计算指标
    '''
    stay_cnt, lost_cnt, accuracy, precision, recall, f1_measure = [], [], [], [], [], []
    thi = list(np.arange(0, 10) / 10)
    y_col=y_test.astype(int)
    for i in thi:
        pre = np.where(y_probas.values[:,0] > i, 1, 0)
        stay_cnt.append(sum(pre == 1))
        lost_cnt.append(sum(pre == 0))
        all_0 = sum(y_col == 0)
        accuracy.append(round(mt.accuracy_score(y_col, pre), 2))
        precision.append(mt.precision_score(y_col, pre))
        recall.append(round(mt.recall_score(y_col, pre), 2))
        f1_measure.append(round(mt.f1_score(y_col, pre), 2))
    true_1_cnt = [int(a * b) for a, b in zip(stay_cnt, precision)]
    true_0_cnt = [int(a - b) for a, b in zip(stay_cnt, true_1_cnt)]
    true_0_cnt_0 = [int(all_0 - a) for a in true_0_cnt]
    true_0_cnt_1 = [int(a - b) for a, b in zip(lost_cnt, true_0_cnt_0)]
    evalue_result = {'阈值': thi, '预测为1数': stay_cnt, '真正为1数': true_1_cnt, '实际为0数': true_0_cnt, '预测为0数': lost_cnt,
                     '真正为0数': true_0_cnt_0, '实际为1数': true_0_cnt_1, '准确率(A)': accuracy,
                     '精确率(P)': list(map(lambda x: round(x, 2), precision)), '召回率(R)': recall, 'F1值': f1_measure}
    metric_value = pd.DataFrame(evalue_result)

    metric_value2 = report_utils.ALogReport().report_predict(data_in[label_column],
                                         data_in[predict_score_column].astype(float), '评估报告')

    '''
       报告
    '''
    report = report_utils.Report()
    report.h1('二分类 评估报告')
    report.h3('模型评价指标')
    report.table(pd.DataFrame(metric_value2['evaluation'], index=[0]))
    report.p(" ")
    report.table(metric_value)
    '''
      绘制混淆矩阵
    '''
    skplt.metrics.plot_confusion_matrix(y_test, y_predict)
    plt.title('CM')
    plt.savefig('cm.png')
    plt.show()
    report.h3('混淆矩阵图')
    report.image('cm.png')
    report.writeToHtml(reportFileName)

    import os
    with open(reportFileName) as file_obj:
        report_result = file_obj.read()
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "report_" + reportFileName, report_result)
    os.remove(reportFileName)

# <EXECTUSCRIPT>
def execute(conn, inputs, params, outputs, reportFileName):

    '''
    载入模块
    '''
    import db_utils
    import warnings
    import pandas as pd
    import scikitplot as skplt
    import json
    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    from sklearn import metrics
    from common import get_db_column
    from common import get_feature
    from common import get_label
    from report_utils import Report
    from common import get_db_column_with_type
    from common import keep_dot_after
    import ast
    warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")


    redisParam = json.loads(params['redis'])
    redisConn = db_utils.getRedisMasterConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                  redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])

    '''
    转换后的参数
    '''
    keep_dot_after(db_type, inputs)
    db_columns = get_db_column_with_type(db_type, inputs, conn)
    label_column = get_label(db_columns, params['label_column'])
    predict_score_column = get_label(db_columns, params['predict_score_column'])
    postive_sample_value = int(params['postive_sample_value'])

    '''
    选择目标数据
    '''
    data_in = db_utils.query(conn,'select * from ' + inputs['data_in'], db_type)

    y_test = data_in[label_column]

    '''
    读取数据
    '''
    y_test = y_test.astype(float)
    y_probas = pd.DataFrame({'0' : [],'1':[]})
    if postive_sample_value == 0:
        y_probas['0'] = data_in[predict_score_column]
        y_probas['1'] = 1-data_in[predict_score_column]
    elif postive_sample_value == 1:
        y_probas['1'] = data_in[predict_score_column]
        y_probas['0'] = 1-data_in[predict_score_column]

    '''
       计算指标
    '''
    # y_predict = (y_probas > 0.5)['1'].astype(float)
    y_predict = y_probas['1']
    metric1_value = pd.DataFrame(columns=['指标', '数值'])
    y_metric_predict = y_predict.astype(float)
    precision, recall, thresholds = metrics.precision_recall_curve(y_test, y_metric_predict, pos_label=1)
    areaUnderPR_value = metrics.auc(recall, precision)
    areaUnderPR = pd.DataFrame({'指标': 'areaUnderPR', '数值': areaUnderPR_value}, index=[0]).fillna(value="None")
    metric1_value = metric1_value.append(areaUnderPR, ignore_index=True)

    '''
       报告
    '''
    report = Report()
    report.h1('PR 评估报告')
    report.h3('模型评价指标')
    report.table(metric1_value)
    '''
      绘制RR曲线
    '''
    skplt.metrics.plot_precision_recall_curve(y_true=y_test, y_probas=y_probas)
    plt.xlabel('recall')
    plt.ylabel('precision')
    plt.title('PR')
    plt.legend(loc="lower right")
    plt.savefig('pr.png')
    plt.show()
    report.h3('Precision-Recall图')
    report.image('pr.png')
    report.writeToHtml(reportFileName)

    import os
    with open(reportFileName) as file_obj:
        report_result = file_obj.read()
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "report_" + reportFileName, report_result)
    os.remove(reportFileName)

children.name: ROC曲线
children.description: ROC曲线描绘的是不同的截断点时，并以FPR（负例分错的概率）和TPR（正例分对的概率）为横纵坐标轴，描述随着截断点的变小，TPR随着FPR的变化。判定方法：ROC曲线离参照线越远，模型预测效果越好。AUC（ROC与横轴的面积）越大，模型预测效果越好。

# <EXECTUSCRIPT>
def execute(conn, inputs, params, outputs, reportFileName):

    '''
    载入模块
    '''
    import report_utils
    import db_utils
    import scikitplot as skplt
    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    from sklearn import metrics
    from common import get_db_column, get_feature, get_label
    import warnings
    import json
    import pandas as pd
    from common import get_db_column_with_type
    from common import keep_dot_after
    import ast
    warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

    redisParam = json.loads(params['redis'])
    redisConn = db_utils.getRedisMasterConnection(redisParam['connectInfo'], redisParam['masterName'],
                                                  redisParam['password'], redisParam['db'])
    '''
    转换后的参数
    '''
    keep_dot_after(db_type, inputs)
    db_columns = get_db_column_with_type(db_type, inputs, conn)
    label_column = get_label(db_columns, params['label_column'])
    predict_score_column = get_label(db_columns, params['predict_score_column'])
    postive_sample_value = int(params['postive_sample_value'])

    '''
    选择目标数据
    '''
    data_in = db_utils.query(conn, 'select * from ' + inputs['data_in'], db_type)

    y_test = data_in[label_column]

    '''
    读取数据
    '''
    y_test = y_test.astype(float)
    y_probas = pd.DataFrame({'0': [], '1': []})
    if postive_sample_value == 0:
        y_probas['0'] = data_in[predict_score_column]
        y_probas['1'] = 1 - data_in[predict_score_column]
    elif postive_sample_value == 1:
        y_probas['1'] = data_in[predict_score_column]
        y_probas['0'] = 1 - data_in[predict_score_column]

    '''
       计算指标
    '''
    # y_predict = (y_probas > 0.5)['1'].astype(float)
    y_predict = y_probas['1']
    metric1_value = pd.DataFrame(columns=['指标', '数值'])
    y_metric_predict = y_predict.astype(float)
    fpr, tpr, thresholds = metrics.roc_curve(y_test, y_metric_predict, pos_label=1)
    auc = metrics.auc(fpr, tpr)
    auc = pd.DataFrame({'指标': 'auc', '数值': auc}, index=[2]).fillna(value="None")
    metric1_value = metric1_value.append(auc, ignore_index=True)
    '''
       报告
    '''
    report = report_utils.Report()
    report.h1('ROC 评估报告')
    report.h3('模型评价指标')
    report.table(metric1_value)

    '''
     绘制ROC曲线
    '''
    # skplt.plotters.plot_roc_curve(y_true=y_test, y_probas=y_probas)
    # plt.xlabel('False Positive Rate')
    # plt.ylabel('True Positive Rate')
    # plt.title('ROC and AUC')
    # plt.legend(loc="lower right")
    # plt.savefig('roc.png')
    # plt.show()

    c_stats = metrics.auc(fpr, tpr)
    plt.plot([0, 1], [0, 1], 'r--')
    plt.plot(fpr, tpr, label="ROC curve")
    auc_value = "AUC = %.2f" % c_stats
    # ks_value = "KS = %.2f" % max(abs(tpr - fpr))
    # plt.text(0.8, 0.4, ks_value, bbox=dict(facecolor="g", alpha=0.7))
    plt.text(0.8, 0.2, auc_value, bbox=dict(facecolor='r', alpha=0.5))
    plt.xlabel('False positive rate')
    plt.ylabel('True positive rate')
    plt.title('ROC curve')  # ROC 曲线
    plt.legend(loc='best')
    plt.savefig('roc.png')
    plt.show()
    report.h3('ROC图')

    # report.p("如下图所示：AUC所占的面积是" + str(np.around(auc, decimals=2)))
    report.image('roc.png')
    report.writeToHtml(reportFileName)




    import os
    with open(reportFileName) as file_obj:
        report_result = file_obj.read()
    db_utils.redisWriteHsetFile(redisConn, params['project_id'], "report_" + reportFileName, report_result)
    os.remove(reportFileName)

# </EXECTUSCRIPT>

children.name: KS曲线
children.description:
KS曲线是把TPR（正例分对的概率）和FPR（负例分错的概率）都作为纵坐标，而样本数作为横坐标。
作用：验证模型对违约对象的区分能力，通常是在模型预测全体样本的信用评分后，将全体样本按违约与非违约分为两部分，然后用KS统计量来检验这两组样本信用评分的分布是否有显著差异。
KS=TPR-FPR(取最大值）

Lift=precision/正例的比例
